description: The problem is a runtime error that occurs when attempting to update a ChainMap object. The error appears when the ChainMap object is updated with a new mapping, but the ChainMap object does not contain the keys in the mapping. This results in the ChainMap object not being updated and an
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 7, in <module>
NameError: name 'chainmap' is not defined
